tweet: It’s time for Congress to put an end to so-called “junk insurance plans.” If you buy insurance, you should be able to expect it to be there when you need it. That’s why we need the Protecting Pre-Existing Conditions & Making Health Care More Affordable Act! #ProtectOurCare pic.twitter.com/oQbteM2hxq
Proud to stand with my fellow @HouseDemocrats to introduce the Protecting Pre-Existing Conditions & Making Health Care More Affordable Act! #ProtectOurCare pic.twitter.com/IYB0LlsuZ9
Proud to have bicameral support and thank @SenBobCasey for introducing the companion bill on the Senate side. Read more on the bill here: https://bit.ly/2YtroKe

The government has never assessed the effect of the internet on hate crimes. This is unacceptable & it is why I am proud to reintroduce the #StopHATE Act w/ @SenBobCasey to direct the @CommerceGov & @TheJusticeDept to report on the impact of telecommunications on #hatecrimes. pic.twitter.com/FQndBM6liG
On this day in 1952 I came at the age of 8 from Puerto Rico to New York. On this day in 1990 I became a member of Congress.

I urge my colleagues in Congress across the aisle to ignore the President’s comments & step up to help ensure the people of Puerto Rico get the help they need. Read the @HispanicCaucus's full statement on the president's latest attack on #PuertoRico here: https://bit.ly/2OtoD77

Once again President Trump has shown he could care less about the millions of American citizens in #PuertoRico. #PuertoRicans deserve adequate & fair levels of funding for nutritional assistance & assistance to continue addressing the island’s needs post #HurricaneMaria.
